text: Developed a finance tracker application using Python and Flask framework for efficient management of income and expenses.

children.text: Implemented CRUD functionality for managing income, expenses, and categories.
Implemented user authentication, authorization, and password hashing for secure user accounts.
Utilized SQLAlchemy as an Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) tool to interact with the underlying database.

text: In progress - Designing an intuitive web interface with a dashboard to visualize financial statistics and transaction details.

children.text: Interactive charts using Chart.js library for enhanced data visualization.

text: To do - Deploy the project on Azure for scalability and accessibility.
